Package model.strategy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IUpdateStrategy
    Update strategy interface that functions for updating the current state of a ball
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BreathingStrategy
    Strategy for a breathing (radius expanding and collapsing) ball
    ColorChangingStrategy
    Strategy for a simple color changing ball that changes colors after 20 ticks of update state
    CurveStrategy
    Strategy for Curve balls (like spin ball but isn't a sinusodal continues curve)
    DisappearStrategy
    Strategy for ball that can turn invisible and visible
    MultiStrategy
    Class for allowing balls to hold multiple strategies at once
    SpinStrategy
    Simple strategy for spinning a ball in a "sin" manner (in a vortex)
    StraightStrategy
    Following is the class defining the ball with only bounce and move.
    SwitcherStrategy
    Strategy for balls that will be able to switch between the multitude of strategies
    WanderStrategy
    Strategy for a ball to mindlessly (randomly) wander around the screen
